1278640.name: Magic Twins Demo
1278640.description:
Due to the ongoing the current situation regarding COVID-19, it is really important for everyone to do our best to advance through this difficult times. On Flying Beast Labs, we wanted to help as much as we can, so we decided to make this special demo for all of you to enjoy at your home. Stay safe, and #stayathome.



Magic Twins is a 1-2 co-operative arcade puzzle game in which Abra and Cadabra (the titular Magic Twins), must constantly swap their chromagic powers to defeat hordes of color elementals and stop the Colormageddon (which they unintentionally unleashed). Red beats red, blue beats blue.. you get the drill. Magic doesn't need to be complicated!





Spells are not enough! Communication (and probably some yelling) will be invaluable to overcome all the challenges ahead of you: different objectives per level, bosses, multiple game modes, special events…




The game features 2D art with spooky kawaii vibes. Do you want cute skins? We have them!




  • COLORMAGEDDON. The end of the world arrives full of colors!
  • COOPERATIVE. Coordinate with your friends and test your reflexes and the power of friendship to combine your chromagic powers.
  • TONS OF CONTENT. Discover new areas of the Mallorca island as you eliminate the threat in the initial areas and unlock new game modes, different enemies, secrets and secondary objectives.
  • SIMPLE CONTROLS, UNIQUE CHALLENGES. Controlling the Magic Twins is simple, but each level has different objectives and turns in the mechanics.
  • KAWAII. Unlock new theme skins for the sisters!
1278640.supported_languages: 英语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 法语, 德语, 日语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 加泰罗尼亚语, 巴斯克语, 加利西亚语
